front.title: Problem Statement of Long-lived TCP Connection

abstract.t: This memo describes issues encountered by a long-lived TCPconnection. Long-lived TCP connections are served for severalapplications, which are quite popularly used in our daily life, suchas chat and messaging(MSN, Skype). Others are computer-to-computercommunications, which are also demanding at long-lived TCPconnection. Issues such as network resources consumption happen whenthere are frequent keepalive message has been transmittedperiodically. Moreover, other issues are occurring during long TCPconnection, such as TCP congestion, TCP connection recovery.Depending on raised issues, protocol optimization could be consideredto optimize network quality.
